publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2936# Dennis Canavan: Location of Mental Welfare Commission—That the Parliament deplores the decision by the Mental Welfare Commission to overturn the proposal to relocate to Falkirk; believes that further consideration should be given to the matter; notes that Falkirk’s central situation and excellent transport links make it an ideal place for relocation, and believes that the Scottish Executive should give top priority to Falkirk in future relocation plans.
S2M-2936 #Location of Mental Welfare Commission (lodged on 8 June 2005) Michael Matheson*

S2M-2936 # Dennis Canavan: Location of Mental Welfare Commission—That the Parliament deplores the decision by the Mental Welfare Commission to overturn the proposal to relocate to Falkirk; believes that further consideration should be given to the matter; notes that Falkirk’s central situation and excellent transport links make it an ideal place for relocation, and believes that the Scottish Executive should give top priority to Falkirk in future relocation plans. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S2M-2936# Location of Mental Welfare Commission (lodged on 8 June 2005) Cathy Peattie*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
